name: Pumpkin Thieves
description:
You are watching on a fast growing pumpkin. You could use that pumpkin for thanksgiving dinner with your family which is next week, so your watching over it to make sure it doesn't get stolen. The bad news is your grandson and his friend want to steal the pumpkin to smash it with their other friends. You won't have that, so your fight till the end of time until they leave that pumpkin alone. 

Click the Blow airhorn button to scare thieves away. The game doesn't have an end so play it as long as you want.

Made with Clickteam Fusion:

https://www.clickteam.com/

airhorn sfx:

https://tuna.voicemod.net/sound/d5ad1b44-fd24-4914-bf86-def6817ac4fe

20 downloads for part 2
